comment: /**  * The join method, called once per joined pair of elements.  *  * @param first The element from first input.  * @param second The element from second input.  * @return The resulting element.  *  * @throws Exception This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation  *                   to fail and may trigger recovery.  */
code: /**  * The join method, called once per joined pair of elements.  *  * @param first The element from first input.  * @param second The element from second input.  * @return The resulting element.  *  * @throws Exception This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation  *                   to fail and may trigger recovery.  */ OUT join(IN1 first, IN2 second) throws Exception.
